General.Name: Zhejiang Yinlun Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Yinlun Machinery Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells thermal management and exhaust gas after-treatment products. The company offers oil cooling filter assembly, oil cooler, cooling module, heat sink, intercooler, EGR cooler, energy pure water cooling equipment, air water cooling equipment, double plate oil cooler, sea and fresh water heat exchanger, supercharged intercooler, engine oil cooler, generator body cycle air cooler, coaxial heat, assembly board, brazing plate, and tanks for commercial and off-road thermal vehicle, and other industries. It also provides engine thermal management systems, battery thermal management services, air conditioning and heat pump systems, electric water valves, gas-liquid separator assemblies, and water pumps for passenger cars; and urea tank assemblies and injection systems, as well as packaging services. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Taizhou, China.
General.Address: No8 Shifeng East Road, Taizhou, China, 317200
